title: Founded
description: Initially organized as the Orange County Chapter of Musical Arts Club

title: Competition Begins
description: Annual competition for piano, organ and voice students became an established event

title: Incorporation
description: Musical Arts Club of Orange County was incorporated as a non-profit corporation

title: Renamed
description: Organization officially changed its name to Musical Arts Competition of Orange County

title: Growing Strong
description: Continues to serve hundreds of young musicians annually
